data.description: class implementing a RIPE whois client
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The current Net::Whois module is specific to INTERNIC domain object
    responses.

    This module though applicable to any "attr:value" pair objects
    provides an API most suitable for interacting with databases running
    RIPE-157 conformant whois servers. This module would also work fine
    with RPSL whois servers.

    See http://www.ripe.net and http://www.apnic.net for examples of
    whois servers running these types of databases for IP, ASN, route,
    etc assignment information.

    Regards, Paul
